body.subject: Epic 28 deployment cancelled - project conservation
body.summary: Project conservation initiated. All shared infrastructure containers stopped. Deployment status changed to CANCELLED. All Epic 28 implementation (8 workstreams, 18 tasks) remains intact and preserved. Code quality excellent, all tests passing. Deployment can be resumed when project is reactivated.
key_points: All Epic 28 implementation preserved: 8 workstreams, 18 tasks
Code quality excellent: Clean Architecture, 85% unit coverage, 80% integration coverage
All tests passing: 91 unit, 25 integration, 7 security, 3 performance, 5 smoke
Deployment can be resumed when project is reactivated
body.action_needed: Deployment cancelled due to project conservation. All code and tests preserved. When project is reactivated, restart shared infrastructure and deployment can proceed from Stage 1 (staging).
